mapper.sql: id, operate_id, operate_account, operate_result, operate_code, error_reason, operate_ip, operate_time, time_spent, operate_uri, operate_method, expiration_status, expiration_at
mapper.insert: insert into sys_operate_record(id, operate_id, operate_account, operate_result, operate_code, error_reason, operate_ip, operate_time, time_spent, operate_uri, operate_method, expiration_status, expiration_at) values (#{record.id ,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{record.operateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{record.operateAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.operateResult,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.operateCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.errorReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.operateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{record.timeSpent,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{record.operateUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.operateMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.expirationStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.expirationAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
